name: Anchored Ministries
description: Anchored Ministries is a faith-based recovery center offering long-term residential treatment for men and women seeking healing and restoration from addiction. They operate Ruth's House and Jacob's House, which are 12-month no-cost residential programs designed to help individuals deepen their relationship with Jesus Christ while building meaningful relationships, securing employment, and cultivating new habits that foster lasting sobriety. The organization provides holistic growth support—spiritually, emotionally, and socially—laying a solid foundation for a productive and fulfilled life.
source: Verified from official Anchored Ministries website and multiple online directories
services: Faith-based addiction recovery, residential treatment, spiritual counseling, employment assistance, life skills training
eligibility: Men and women seeking recovery from addiction, faith-based approach
notes: The organization offers 12-month residential programs at no cost. They have separate facilities for men (Jacob's House) and women (Ruth's House). Contact their Intake Coordinator at (606) 765-7336 to begin the interview process.
